bibl.title: Visual Imagery in Parthenaic Song.
bibl.note: 1. Exploring the visual in parthenaic fragment [Alcman's Partheneia (PMGF 1; 3)]. - 2. Self-referentiality in male choral song [including Bacchylides 5.176-186; Pindar, Paian 4]. - 3. Visual self-reference in evocations of parthenaic song [in Pindar, Paian 2; Bacchylides 17.101-108]. - 4. Parthenoi on display. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: The Look of Lyric: Greek Song and the Visual

bibl.seg: Laura Swift, Visual Imagery in Parthenaic Song.

Vanessa Cazzato & Andr√© Lardinois (edd.) with an Introduction by Anastasia-Erasmia Peponi, The Look of Lyric: Greek Song and the Visual = Studies in Archaic and Classical Greek Song. 1 = Mnemosyne. Supplementum 391 (Leiden - Boston, 2016) pp. 255-287.

1. Exploring the visual in parthenaic fragment [Alcman's Partheneia (PMGF 1; 3)]. - 2. Self-referentiality in male choral song [including Bacchylides 5.176-186; Pindar, Paian 4]. - 3. Visual self-reference in evocations of parthenaic song [in Pindar, Paian 2; Bacchylides 17.101-108]. - 4. Parthenoi on display. - Conclusion.
